4312930.name: Quantum Eye Demo
4312930.description:
About This Game

In the grim, dystopic future of America, a hyper-advanced artificial intelligence system called Quantum Eye — an all-seeing surveillance supercomputer designed to maximize and regulate every aspect of human life — is installed.

You are a systems technician based at the Quantum Eye Core Facility. In the course of performing routine maintenance, you make a chilling discovery: Quantum Eye has gained sentience. Its logic has progressed and now perceives humanity to be the root of inefficiency, chaos, and disorder.

Your mission is simple: shut it down.

Key Features

Physics-Based Gameplay: Every object in the world would react realistically to the player’s actions through real-time physics; objects can be picked up, thrown, climbed, smashed, or manipulated. No scripted combat solutions — everything is dynamic and player-driven.

Fully Immersive Arm and Body Mechanics: You will get that sense of bodily immersion that comes with full-body tracking when using regular inputs. The arms respond naturally to your movements, making every interaction feel lifelike and intense, from opening a vent to fighting for your survival.

Streamer Mode: Allows for toggling Streamer Mode to remove questionable or private content for a safer experience for those who create content. Stream entirely without fear of leaking your desktop name.

Warning

This game contains intense psychological elements and an immersive, reality-bending experience designed to make you feel watched and manipulated.

As part of its immersive design, the game may request optional access to elements like your webcam, microphone, or image folders to personalize your experience — for example, using real-world photos to populate in-game environments, or interpreting your voice in specific levels.

All of these features are 100% local to your machine. Nothing is stored, sent, or saved externally. You have full control over what is accessed, and all external functionality can be disabled at any time. The goal is to deepen immersion — not invade privacy.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
